title: Ep 70: Books, Boats, Proposals and Perfume With Danielle Mullen
itunes:title: Ep 70: Books, Boats, Proposals and Perfume With Danielle Mullen
itunes:subtitle: Danni Mullen, owner of Semicolon Chicago (Chicago’s only Black woman owned bookstore!) joins us again, this time IRL! On today’s discussion list: eyelashes, perfume, books, Jeff Bezos, marriage proposals, weddings, boats, and R*chel H*llis. And a lot o...
description:
Danni Mullen, owner of Semicolon Chicago (Chicago’s only Black woman owned bookstore!) joins us again, this time IRL! On today’s discussion list: eyelashes, perfume, books, Jeff Bezos, marriage proposals, weddings, boats, and R*chel H*llis. And a lot of laughter throughout.


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Top 8 Best Selling Products in the Gee Thanks! Community in 2020!


8. The Hot Tub ($529): https://amzn.to/3aYP1TO

7. Digit for saving: https://digit.co/r/GeeThanks?ab

6. Rakuten for cash back while you shop: https://www.rakuten.com/r/CAROLI33174?eeid=28187

5. Universal Standard: https://fave.co/3l5KtN7

4. LED Lights: https://amzn.to/2WZO9WG

3. Home Comforts: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780743272865

2. The Revlon One Step: https://amzn.to/3o96cFO

1. The Garden Witch Overalls (Size up!): https://amzn.to/383oGlt


Subscribe to Hotline Skin, a once monthly newsletter about skincare product recs from Jolie: https://www.geethanksjustboughtit.com/hotline-skin 


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
